APP_SUBTITLE: Stock assessment database for sea cucumbers and other invertebrates
ABOUT_FEAT1: BDMer is a user-driven and user-friendly data management tool for coral reef invertebrate resources (sea cucumbers, trochus, giant clams...). It was created in 2011 through a partnership between the IRD (Institut de recherche pour le développement), the Northern Province of New Caledonia and the Government of Vanuatu (Fisheries Department).
ABOUT_FEAT2: BDMer allows both for incorporating field observations on invertebrate resources and marine habitat maps into a database, and for performing statistical analyses. Users can estimate invertebrate stock level (species biomass, abundance, density...) and associated uncertainty through a data computing module.
ABOUT_FEAT3: BDMer also contains a result display module (tables, graphs...) for rapid and functional analysis of biological data. Species result forms can then be converted into PDF files to generate standardized survey reports.
ANALYSE_TITLE: Process data and estimating invertebrate stocks
ERROR_CONFLICT_USER: This user already exists in the database
NAME: Name
IMPORT_PLATFORMS_DESC: Import CSV file with new platforms
IMPORT_DESC_KML: A KML file is an XML notation for expressing geographic annotation and visualization within Internet-based, two-dimensional maps and three-dimensional Earth browsers. Download the example below to know the exact format for this import.
IMPORT_DESC_ADMIN: As an Admin, beware that import file format are slightly different from common users, your import require a column with the codeCOuntry
IMPORT_DESC: A CSV file is a comma-separated values file where values of a same object are on a same line separated by commas and back line characters delimits different objects: 1 object per line and 1 value per comma. It can have header included. Download the example below to know the exact format for this import.
IMPORT_DESC_DATE: CAUTION: beware of date format, if your file is in 'english' format using comma-separated-values, expected date format is 'MM/DD/YYYY, if your file is in 'french' format using semicolons as limiter expected date format is 'DD/MM/YYY'
DOWNLOAD_CSV_PLATFORMS: Download CSV example for platforms import

DOWNLOAD_KML_ZONES: Download KML example for zones import
DOWNLOAD_CSV_SPECIES: Download CSV example for species import
SPECIES_HABITATS_EX: Ex : Coastal reefs in detritus and sand areas surounded by coral patches? Depth : 0-3m
ADD_FISHING_DIMS: Add fishing dimensions for another country
IMPORT_STATIONS_DESC: Import CSV file with stations for

PARTICIPANTS_EX: Name of the participants separated by commas
SURVEY_DESC_EX: Describe specials informations concerning this survey
NO_USERS: There is no known users for this country
ZONE_COORD_EX: Structure of polygon coordinates : 'longitude1, latitude1, altitude1 longitude2, latitude2, altitude2 ... longitudeN, latitudeN, altitudeN'
NO_PLATFORM: No platform saved for this country
NO_YEARS: No survey/campaign registered for these platforms
NO_ZONES: No survey selected OR no zone registered for these surveys
NO_STATIONS: No zone selected OR no station registered for these zones
NO_SPECIES: No station selected OR no species counts saved for these stations
ZONE_COORD_EX: Copy and past coordonates from a KML file
NUMBER_SP_SELECT: Number of species selected in this survey
SPECIES_MIN_DIMS: Choose animal size to consider in analysis
CONFIRM_DELETE_COUNT: Are you sure you want to delete this count from database ?
CONFIRM_DELETE_ZONEPREF: Are you sure you want to delete this preference area from database ?
CONFIRM_DELETE_COUNTRY: Are you sure you want to delete this country from database ?
CONFIRM_DELETE_PLATFORM: Are you sure you want to delete this platform from database ?
CONFIRM_DELETE_SPECIES: Are you sure you want to delete this species from database ?
CONFIRM_DELETE_STATION: Are you sure you want to delete this station from database ?
CONFIRM_DELETE_SURVEY: Are you sure you want to delete this survey from database ?
CONFIRM_DELETE_ZONE: Are you sure you want to delete this zone from database ?
CSV_FIELD_ERROR: Wrong CSV File Unknown field detected
EMAIL_ERROR: This email is not registered in BDMer, please contact administrator
IMPORT_ERROR_PLATFORM: Import is not possible : country has not been defined
IMPORT_ERROR_ZONEPREF: Import is not possible : zonePref codePlatform is different from selected platform
IMPORT_ERROR_COUNT: Import is not possible : count codePlatform is different from selected platform
IMPORT_ERROR_STATION: Import is not possible : station codePlatform is different from selected platform
IMPORT_ERROR_SURVEY: Import is not possible : survey codePlatform is different from selected platform
ERROR_CSV_FIELD: Error while checking CSV, following field(s) are unknown:
ERROR_IMPORT: Error while checking CSV's data, see details just below.
VALID_IMPORT: CSV valid and ready to be send.
DELETE_STATION_CONFIRM: It will delete file : Station. Are you sure to continue?
DELETE_SURVEY_CONFIRM: It will delete file : Survey. Are you sure to continue?
DELETE_COUNT_CONFIRM: It will delete file : Count. Are you sure to continue?
DELETE_STATION_COUNT_CONFIRM: It will delete file : Station, Count. Are you sure to continue?
DELETE_SURVEY_COUNT_CONFIRM: It will delete file : Survey, Count. Are you sure to continue?
CANNOT_BE_INSERTED_NOT_EXIST: cannot be inserted because it doesn't exist in database
NO_STATION_IN_DB: There is no stations in the the database for platform
NO_SPECIES_IN_DB: There is no species in the the database
NO_SURVEY_IN_DB: There is no surveys in the the database for platform
INTERSECT_ERROR: Zone invalid, it intersect with another zone
STATION_NOT_IN_ZONE: One station or more are not located in a zone
STATIONS_NOT_IN_ZONE: One or more station aren't in an existing zone
ERROR_GEOJSON_ZONE_NAME: Geojson file missing or wrong 'name' field - mandatory
GRAPH_PER_ZONES: Species evolution per year and zone
CLICK_ZONE: Click on zone to display its graphs
TOO_MUCH_ENTITY_COUNT: There is too many count in your csv file, please choose a file with less than 200 counts
CSV_RDY_IMPORT: CSV file is ready to be imported
WILL_DELETE_ALL_ZONE: Warning ! Importing this file will delete all the existing zones. Are you sure to continue?
IMPORT_COUNT_NO_MESURE: Warning, counts for this country must not contain a column 'mesures' but a column 'count' with the number of speciemen recorded
CSV_COUNT_TYPE1: CSV example file without height/width relation
CSV_COUNT_TYPE2: CSV example file with height/width relation
COUNT_TYPE_SELECT: Select count type (simple count or with mesurements):
NONE_ASTERIX: The data do not provide an estimate of biomass
LOGIN_SYSTEM_ERROR: An unknown error occurred, contact website administrator
AFFINE_PERIOD: If necessary, refine the time of the year
NO_COORDINATES: One or many stations coordinates are missing
WRONG_COORD_FORMAT: Coordinates are not in decimal degrees format
IMPORT_ZONE_WARNING: WARNING import of new zones will destroy the platform existing zones
ZONES_NO_RATIO: Zones not included in stock estimates (< 0.2 stations / km²)
STOCK_STATS: Stock assessment was performed through statistical inference using abundance data across stations. Only those areas where enough fishing data was available were included (average > one station over 5 km²). Results below are therefore estimates. 95% confidence intervals are indicated as a measure of the achieved precision.
AVERAGE_STATIONS: Average number of stations per km²
AVERAGE_ABUNDANCE_LEGAL: Average abundance of legal sized individuals
AVERAGE_BIOMASS_LEGAL: Average biomass of legal sized individuals
PLATFORM_NO_DATA: Disabled platforms don't have enought data to produce a stock estimation
HARVEST_SIZES: Countries with minimum harvest size or weights
